narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: True Answer Community Wellness LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Glendale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.9M in Medicaid payments across 54K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
